attributes.action: Make a pump track next to Holywell skate park
attributes.additional_details: On hot days the skate park gets really cramped and we can hardly ride scooter/bikes/etc at Holywell skate park
attributes.background: Make the skate park a better place and make more room for more people

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
